missing.game.world.nodes

Class WorldTile.Pile

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.game.items.Item
      • missing.game.items.nonmovable.NonMovable
        • missing.game.world.nodes.WorldTile.Pile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldTile.TileObject
    Enclosing class:
    WorldTile

    public static class WorldTile.Pile
extends NonMovable
    This class is created if the player wants to step inside the tile and there is an object inside it. This class is contained inside the WorldTile class because it is a class created for additional functionality.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • performAction

        public void performAction(Player player)
                   throws GameException,
                          SignalException
        Description copied from interface: WorldTile.TileObject
        Performs the default action for the specified item. If the item is a movable object, then the player picks that item up. If the item is interactable, then it allows the user to perform special actions such as cook food or collect resources.
        Throws:
        GameException
        SignalException
